recently_narrative:
1. The article titles suggest that Zendesk is undergoing a significant strategic shift towards AI-powered contact center solutions, with a focus on improving operational efficiency and customer experience, while also grappling with product deprecation and integration challenges.

2. This means that Zendesk administrators need to closely monitor the rollout and integration of AI features, ensure thorough testing and staging before production deployment, and be prepared to manage the impact of product changes and partner ecosystem shifts on their Zendesk implementation and overall customer support operations.

release_notes.summary:
1. Support added incremental export APIs for custom objects to enable customers to build reports on their custom object data in external reporting tools.

2. AI Agents Advanced released the unified request view and enabled agents to rate their own tickets where they are requestors, but fixed an issue where agents could no longer change a CSAT score for tickets they are not requestors of if they discover a link.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-09-19
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Support
AI Agents Advanced
Products with no updates this week
